Text.content:
This short tutorial guides your first steps in OpenCms. It will explain how to edit content and create new pages.

First you need to log in

Before you can edit content with OpenCms, you need to log in. Start with the "Demo" user. The default login information for this user is displayed in the blue box on the left.

Enter the information from the box on the left in the login form below and press "Login":
